name: CreatePreReceiveEnvironment
description:
Create a new pre-receive environment on GitHub Enterprise.

This tool is used to create a pre-receive environment in GitHub Enterprise. It should be called when you need to set up an environment for pre-receive hooks.

parameters.name: tarball_download_url
parameters.description: URL to download the tarball for the pre-receive environment setup.

value_schema.description: URL from which to download a tarball of this environment.

parameters.name: pre_receive_environment_name
parameters.description: The name of the new pre-receive environment to be created.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: image_url
parameters.description: URL from which to download a tarball of this environment.

value_schema.description: URL from which to download a tarball of this environment.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
